entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 80 early this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
